thread.title: Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture

title: Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture
text:
Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture 7:44pm GMT - 02:01 
Politics may have overshadowed the pageantry of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics' opening ceremony, as South Korea's president was joined by Kim Jong-un's sister, the first person from the North's ruling family to visit that country.   
Politics may have overshadowed the pageantry of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics' opening ceremony, as South Korea's president was joined by Kim Jong-un's sister, the first person from the North's ruling family to visit that country.  //reut.rs/2EylHnm
